Question & Options:
Which of the following statements about the production design in the movie 'Kalank' (2019) are true?
Options:
A. The movie's set design reflects the architecture of Old Delhi mohalla.
B. Kalank was filmed entirely on location in Old Delhi.
C. The production utilized Film City, Mumbai to represent Old Delhi mohalla.
D. The film features a modern interpretation of Old Delhi's historical aesthetics.
Correct Answer: The movie's set design reflects the architecture of Old Delhi mohalla., The production utilized Film City, Mumbai to represent Old Delhi mohalla.

D. D. Bahaar Begum is a character that appears in multiple films.

Which of the following statements are true regarding the movie 'Kalank' released in 2019?
Options:
A. Alia Bhatt and Varun Dhawan participated in the clap shot of Kalank.
B. Sajid Nadiadwala and Karan Johar were the producers of Kalank.
C. Kalank features only Alia Bhatt as a lead actor.
D. The clap shot of Kalank was filmed without any lead actors present.
Correct Answer: Alia Bhatt and Varun Dhawan participated in the clap shot of Kalank., Sajid Nadiadwala and Karan Johar were the producers of Kalank.

Question & Options:
Which of the following statements are true regarding the movie 'Kalank' released in 2019?
Options:
A. Aditya Roy Kapur is part of the cast of Kalank.
B. Kalank was conceived by Karan Johar and his father Yash Johar.
C. Kalank was released in 2020.
D. The concept of Kalank was developed about 15 years before its release.
Correct Answer: Aditya Roy Kapur is part of the cast of Kalank., Kalank was conceived by Karan Johar and his father Yash Johar., The concept of Kalank was developed about 15 years before its release.
